description: Displays Dawn, Sunrise, Solar Noon, Sunset, Dusk times for the current location according to NOAA (National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration).   Great for photographers, golfers, hikers, and anyone who spends time outdoors or enjoys the beauty of sunrises and sunsets!  Also, regardless of the selected date, it will show the hours/minutes till the next occurance of these events at your particular location.  More features coming soon!
